info.name: Cerebellum, nodule or nodulus of the vermis
info.description: The nodule or nodulus of the cerebellum is a small portion of the ventral and anterior vermis that is attached to the flocculus to form the flocculonodular lobe. Functionally, the flocculonodular lobe is associated with balance as well as movements of the eyes.
info.item: /Sections/Thin, Whole Brain/Sagittal & Parasagittal/1 Sag Thin Sec
